docstring.long_description:
When Read-After-Write is on, the Prologix USB-to-GPIB controller
automatically reads a bench-top instrument's response after writing a
command to it.

Requires an OPEN_SERIAL block.

Inputs
------
default: DataContainer
    Any DataContainer

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The open serial connection with the instrument.

returns.description: Response from the Prologix USB-to-GPIB controller.
